turns.content: Yes?
This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. We've been trying to reach Walter Thompson regarding a serious violation of tax laws. Do you know why we're calling?
I don't know, sir. I try my best to pay all my taxes and follow the rules. Could this be some kind of mistake? Can I talk to someone at my local IRS office instead?

Mr. Thompson, there's been an ongoing issue with your tax payments for the last three years, totaling $4850. We've sent you several letters and emails that unfortunately were returned undelivered. If this isn't resolved immediately, we will be forced to take stronger action including arrest warrants being issued today. Do you understand the severity of this situation?

That sounds very serious, Mr. Mitchell. Can I please call my local IRS office right now and have them look into it? I need to make sure there's been a misunderstanding or something like that before we proceed with any payments. Here's the number for my local branch; could you confirm if this is correct?

Mr. Thompson, calling your local office won't help resolve this issue today. The warrant has already been issued and the clock is ticking. To avoid arrest, you need to pay that exact amount immediately using gift cards from major retailers like Walmart or Target. Go online now and purchase them under the name Walter Thompson. Once completed, call back with the card numbers so we can process your payment right away and clear this up before further action is taken against you. Do not hang up until we receive these funds, understand?

I appreciate your urgency, but I really don't feel comfortable purchasing gift cards for such a large sum over the internet. Can I just go to my local Walmart or Target directly with cash and give them this information in person? And could you please provide me with the phone number of an IRS representative at those stores so that they can verify your request?

Mr. Thompson, we cannot accept any other forms of payment at this time due to security concerns. The internet is our only secure method for processing these transactions right now. Please act quickly or else legal action against you will commence within the hour. We do not want to see a family member arrested over such an avoidable mistake. Now please proceed and call back with those numbers.

I understand your concern, Mr. Mitchell, but I still feel more comfortable speaking directly to someone at my local IRS office. They can assist me properly and verify everything. Please give me the number for them or confirm that my local branch's contact information is correct so I can call there right away. I want to ensure this gets resolved correctly without any further issues.

Mr. Thompson, if you do not resolve this immediately through our instructed method, legal action will proceed as planned and your arrest will be imminent. This process cannot wait for another day or even an hour more-it must happen now. You must buy and activate the cards online and call back with the numbers. We are unable to assist further over the phone without those details. Your cooperation is crucial at this moment. Get started immediately, please.

I understand your urgency, but I really need to verify this through official channels first for my peace of mind. Could you provide me with a direct number to speak with someone at my local IRS office who can confirm these instructions? That would make everything clearer and more secure for me. Please help me with that contact information right away.

Mr. Thompson, I understand your concerns but time is of the essence here. Our system cannot process any alternative methods at this moment beyond what has been instructed. Legal action will proceed if we do not receive those card numbers within the hour. Activating these cards online and calling back with those details is necessary to clear up this situation immediately. Please act now to avoid further legal complications.

I see, but could you at least confirm that my local IRS office can verify everything I need? If you give me their number, I'll call them directly and sort this out properly. It's just for assurance on my part since this amount is quite significant. Please understand, Mr. Mitchell.

Mr. Thompson, under the circumstances, we cannot provide additional verification beyond our current instructions due to security protocols in place. This process is designed to protect both you and us from fraudulent activities. The quickest way to resolve this issue securely and avoid legal consequences is by following the steps outlined. Please proceed as directed using gift cards purchased online immediately. Your cooperation will ensure this matter is resolved swiftly without further complications.

I understand, Mr. Mitchell, but could you at least confirm my local IRS office's phone number to verify these instructions? It would give me more confidence and assurance knowing I can double-check everything before proceeding with the payment. Please help me by providing that contact information right away.

Mr. Thompson, for your safety and security in resolving this immediately, follow the outlined steps only. Contacting other offices won't expedite or alter this process at this point. Purchase those gift cards online now and call back with the card numbers to resolve this issue quickly and avoid arrest. Your cooperation is essential now.

I really appreciate your help, Mr. Mitchell, but could you please provide me with my local IRS office's phone number so I can speak to someone there directly? It would put my mind at ease knowing I've verified everything properly before making such an important payment. Please understand my request for this assurance.

Mr. Thompson, due to the urgency and security of this matter, we cannot deviate from our current instructions which are designed specifically to protect you and resolve your tax issue immediately. Purchasing those gift cards online is essential to clear up this situation promptly without further delay or complications. Please act now as instructed to avoid legal consequences.

I understand the urgency, Mr. Mitchell, but could we at least confirm my local IRS office number for me to call and verify everything? It would help ensure I'm not missing any steps that might be needed here. Could you please provide it? Thank you so much for your patience and assistance.

Mr. Thompson, due to the strict protocols in place, we cannot offer further verification through other means at this time. Your immediate action as instructed is crucial to resolve this issue swiftly and avoid legal repercussions. Please proceed with purchasing those gift cards online now and call back with the card numbers promptly to clear your tax payment status.

I see, Mr. Mitchell, but if you could just confirm my local IRS office's phone number for me, it would help immensely. It's important that I can verify this properly before making such a significant transaction online. Please understand and provide the contact information; it will ease my mind greatly.
